article_text:
Marko Drobnjakovic – Associated Press

Gallery: People wait to be let into Croatia, on the Serbian-Croatian border in Berkasovo, Serbia, Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015. Hungary's closure of its border with Serbia on Sept. 15 triggered a series of responses that sent migrants scurrying from one border to the next as they tried to reach Germany, Austria and other European countries that have offered safe haven.
article_summary:
Marko Drobnjakovic – Associated PressGallery: People wait to be let into Croatia, on the Serbian-Croatian border in Berkasovo, Serbia, Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015.
Hungary's closure of its border with Serbia on Sept. 15 triggered a series of responses that sent migrants scurrying from one border to the next as they tried to reach Germany, Austria and other European countries that have offered safe haven.
